titles.title: CB 157 The Joy of the Lord is My Strength

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
THE JOY OF THE LORD IS MY STRENGTH,
The joy of the Lord is my strength. (3x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The word of faith is nigh thee, even in thy mouth,
(3x)
The joy of the Lord is my strength.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He gives me living water and I thirst no more, (3x)
The joy of the Lord is my strength.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I'll sing and shout and praise His name, for He is
Lord, (3x)
The joy of the Lord is my strength.
